instruction: looking for a scary movie about the end of the world
output: If you’re into end-of-the-world vibes and some seriously intense moments, you’ve got to check out The Remaining! It mixes horror with that apocalyptic feel in a way that’ll keep you on the edge of your seat 😱🔥. Plus, the whole wedding turned chaos thing is super unique!

instruction: any good horror movies with a wedding and apocalypse theme?
output: Oh, I know just the movie for you! The Remaining has this wild combo of a wedding and the apocalypse happening at the same time 🎬💥. It’s got chills, thrills, and that found footage style that makes it feel super real. Perfect for a spooky night in!

instruction: want a thriller about faith and fear during the rapture
output: You should watch The Remaining! It’s a gripping thriller where faith and fear collide during the rapture—totally gripping and full of edge-of-your-seat moments 🙏😨. It’s a fresh take on the apocalypse that will definitely keep you hooked!
